# Mediators of Vaccine Efficacy {#cop-mediators}

```{r cop-mediator-setup, echo = FALSE, message = FALSE, warning = FALSE, results="asis"}
library(here)

all_COR <- c(
	"D29IncludeNotMolecConfirmed", 
	"D29SevereIncludeNotMolecConfirmed", 
	"D29ModerateIncludeNotMolecConfirmed"
)

all_TRIAL <- c(
  "janssen_pooled_partA",
  "janssen_la_partA",
  "janssen_sa_partA",
  "janssen_na_partA"
)

for(run_survtmle in c(TRUE, FALSE)){
	cat(paste0("## ", ifelse(run_survtmle, "Survival endpoint", "Binary endpoint")))
	for(COR in all_COR){
		for(TRIAL in all_TRIAL){
			res = knitr::knit_child(
		  	  here::here('cop_mediation', 'report_sub_ensemble_severe.Rmd')
			)
		  cat(res, sep = '\n')
		}
	}
}
```
